meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pseudonymous.
meanings.sent1: Her pseudonymities in online forums kept her true identity hidden.
meanings.sent2: The author's pseudonymities allowed them to write freely without fear of judgment.
meanings.sent3: The detective's pseudonymities made solving the case more mysterious.
meanings.sent4: In a world of pseudonymities, who can truly know another's real self?
meanings.sent5: The cloak of pseudonymities shrouded the writer's true persona.

meanings.sent1: The famous author's pseudonymities were revealed after years of speculation.
meanings.sent2: Many online users prefer pseudonymities to protect their privacy.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's pseudonymities added an element of surprise to the show.
meanings.sent4: Under the pseudonymities of 'Nightshade,' the artist created stunning works of art.
meanings.sent5: The world of literature is filled with pseudonymities used by writers throughout history.
